metadata.title: CVE-2021-46972 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ovl:fix leaked dentry Since commit 6815f479ca90 ("ovl: use only uppermetacopystate in ovl_lookup()"), overlayfs doesn't put temporary dentry when thereis a metacopy error, which leads to dentry leaks when shutting down therelated superblock: overlayfs: refusing to follow metacopy origin for(/file0) ... BUG: Dentry (____ptrval____){i=3f33,n=file3} still in use (1)[unmount of overlay overlay] ... WARNING: CPU: 1 PID: 432 atumount_check.cold+0x107/0x14d CPU: 1 PID: 432 Comm: unmount-overlay Nottainted 5.12.0-rc5 #1 ... RIP: 0010:umount_check.cold+0x107/0x14d ... CallTrace: d_walk+0x28c/0x950 ? dentry_lru_isolate+0x2b0/0x2b0 ?__kasan_slab_free+0x12/0x20 do_one_tree+0x33/0x60shrink_dcache_for_umount+0x78/0x1d0 generic_shutdown_super+0x70/0x440kill_anon_super+0x3e/0x70 deactivate_locked_super+0xc4/0x160deactivate_super+0xfa/0x140 cleanup_mnt+0x22e/0x370 __cleanup_mnt+0x1a/0x30task_work_run+0x139/0x210 do_exit+0xb0c/0x2820 ?__kasan_check_read+0x1d/0x30 ? find_held_lock+0x35/0x160 ?lock_release+0x1b6/0x660 ? mm_update_next_owner+0xa20/0xa20 ?reacquire_held_locks+0x3f0/0x3f0 ?__sanitizer_cov_trace_const_cmp4+0x22/0x30 do_group_exit+0x135/0x380__do_sys_exit_group.isra.0+0x20/0x20 __x64_sys_exit_group+0x3c/0x50do_syscall_64+0x45/0x70 entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x44/0xae ... VFS:Busy inodes after unmount of overlay. Self-destruct in 5 seconds. Have anice day... This fix has been tested with a syzkaller reproducer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500mc - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-emb - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1054-aws - 4.4.0-1002.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1059-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-12.19').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1002.2').
linux-azure package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1').
